SELECT s.id ,e.name
,s.date ,s.scheduled_start ,s.scheduled_end FROM shift_schedules AS s INNER JOIN employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) BETWEEN #{targetMonth} -1 AND #{targetMonth} +1 ;
SELECT id ,employee_id ,date ,scheduled_start ,scheduled_end FROM shift_requests WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY date ASC ;
SELECT id AS shiftId ,date FROM shift_schedules WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND date >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY date ASC ;

SELECT s.id ,s.employee_id ,e.name ,s.date ,s.scheduled_start ,s.scheduled_end FROM shift_schedules AS s INNER JOIN employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) = #{targetMonth} ORDER BY date ASC ;
SELECT r.id ,r.employee_id ,e.name ,r.date ,r.scheduled_start ,r.scheduled_end FROM shift_requests AS r INNER JOIN employees AS e ON r.employee_id = e.id ;
SELECT id ,name FROM employees WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT employee_id FROM shift_requests ) ;
